str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The night, night-time. A primary word; 'night'.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
Darkness, either physical or moral. From the base of skia; shadiness, i.e. Obscurity.
